titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991, relating to a rural access project in Mt. Vernon, Illinois.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/8/2003--Introduced. Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to authorize a rural access project involving improvements of the Wells Bypass (45th Street) in Mt. Vernon, Illinois.
